meanings.definition: Able to be explained or understood.
meanings.sent1: The simple math problem was explicable to the students.
meanings.sent2: The scientist provided an explicable reason for the experiment's results.
meanings.sent3: It was quite explicable why the cat chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The mystery of the missing keys was finally explicable when they were found in the fridge.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's clear explanation made the concept explicable to everyone in the class.

meanings.definition: Capable of being accounted for or understood.
meanings.sent1: The sudden change in weather was not explicable by the meteorologists.
meanings.sent2: Her actions were always explicable once you understood her motivations.
meanings.sent3: It was explicable why the dog barked at the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The growth of the plant was explicable due to the ample sunlight it received.
meanings.sent5: The detective found an explicable clue that led to solving the case.
